columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the instance in Amazon EMR.

columns.name: cluster_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the cluster.

columns.name: ec2_instance_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the instance in Amazon EC2.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The current state of the instance.

columns.name: instance_fleet_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the instance fleet to which an EC2 instance belongs.

columns.name: instance_group_id
columns.description: The identifier of the instance group to which this instance belongs.

columns.name: instance_type
columns.description: The EC2 instance type, for example m3.xlarge.

columns.name: market
columns.description: The instance purchasing option. Valid values are ON_DEMAND or SPOT.

columns.name: private_dns_name
columns.description: The private DNS name of the instance.

columns.name: private_ip_address
columns.description: The private IP address of the instance.

columns.name: public_dns_name
columns.description: The public DNS name of the instance.

columns.name: public_ip_address
columns.description: The public IP address of the instance.

columns.name: ebs_volumes
columns.description: The list of Amazon EBS volumes that are attached to this instance.

columns.name: state_change_reason
columns.description: The status change reason details for the instance.

columns.name: status_timeline
columns.description: The timeline of the instance status over time.
